hadith.text: Narrated Al-Bara' bin 'Azib: "The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) prohibited riding (while sitting on) Miyathir." [Abu 'Eisa said:] There are narrations on this topic from 'Ali and Mu'awiyah. The Hadith if Al-Bara' is Hasan Sahih. Shu'bah reported similarly from Ash'ath bin Abi Ash-Sha'tha' in the lengthy Hadith
